I cant in good faith put a thumbs up to this game because no matter how fun it can be, when you get to high elo, it is riddled with hackers. The russians isn't even a problem they can do whatever they want and long as they dont int, but if you think this game is fun, but you keep getting matched with hackers, it will make you want to uninstall.
